relation: The weather is very cold and temperatures go below freezing point. Not the best time for sightseeing as high altitude areas receive snowfall and the area remains closed for any tourist visit. It is suitable time for holidaymakers who enjoy chilly and cold climate. As a matter of fact, this period is also quite enjoyable for honeymoon trip in Northeast India.Thick woolen apparels are recommended for this period. Besides, special care should be taken if travelling with kids or the aged.

The weather remains very cold in February and enjoying outdoor activities can be a bit tough and challenging. The month is accompanied by foggy chilly mornings and cold nights. The period is still suitable for honeymooners and holidaymakers who enjoy cold and chilly weather. Heavy woolens are required and for tourists accompanied by kids or old people, extra care is required.

Temperature starts to rise a little but the weather is still cold. Days are quite pleasing with lots of blue skies but nights are cold. Official tourist season begins from this month. It is an ideal time for enjoying sighting various attractions of the place. Besides, adventurous sports like mountain biking and trekking can also be done. Woolen clothes are preferable this period.

It is a spring season and the natural beauty of the place is at its zenith. Days are cool with lots of clear blue skies, but nights can get chilly. The temperatures are comfortably cold and is ideal for sightseeing and adventure activities like trekking and mountaineering. Summers will begin from the end of this month.

The region is very beautiful with pleasant climate. The temperature starts to rise but falls within the comfortable range. The month has lots of blue skies and little rainfall is quite common. Sighting of various attractions and carrying out adventurous sports like rafting, trekking and mountain biking are favorable during this month.

June offers pleasant ambience making it suitable for tourist visits. Daytime is very pleasing and evenings are cool. It is a good time for sightseeing and holidaying. Besides, adventure sports like water rafting can also be enjoyed. However, short rainfall is a common occurrence in June.

Monsoon sets in July. The place receives heavy rainfall in this month and landslides are a common occurrence, making it not the most apt time for holidaying. July is also recorded with maximum rainfalls making it the wettest month of the year. However, the regionâs lush greenery is enjoyable for nature enthusiast and those who enjoy monsoon effect. July being an off-season, the prices of tour packages as well as hotels are also comparatively lower than peak season.

Rain continues to play the spoiler. It will rain often and sometimes for long periods. Landslides are a common calamity in this region and make it difficult for tourism. However, the place becomes attractive and beautiful with its green surroundings. Nature and rains lovers can plan for their visit. The hotel rates are also lower than peak season.

The area receives a good amount of rainfall in this month. There may be several days without rain and some blue sky in the breaks making it suitable for tourist activities. Temperatures are comfortable with cool breeze and the period is ideal for holidays. Adventure activities like river rafting can also be done.

The official high season starts from October. The weather is cool and pleasant making it the best time for sightseeing and holidaying. Adventure tourists can also get indulged in activities like river rafting, trekking and mountain biking. It would be a good idea to book tour packages for Darjeeling Gangtok in advance as the prices will be hike during peak tourist season.

Winter truly arrives in November with very cold weather. Nights are comparatively colder than daytime. The period is favorable of sighting attractions and taking up adventure activities like trekking. It is recommended to carry warm clothes for this season. Moreover, tourists accompanied by kids or old people need to be more careful.

The month starts on a very cold note and is about to get worse. Temperatures can dip to freezing levels making it difficult for enjoying tourism. However, tourists can still visit the place till the middle of the month, after which the temperature get much colder. Heavy woolens are required and special care needs to be taken if travelling with kids or the aged.
